name: The Derelict Orpheus: Post-Jam Edition
description:
An eldritch sci-fi whodunnit jam game. Original version created in 72 hours for Mini Jam #73. Five different resolutions to the mystery!

The Post-Jam Edition (v1.1) incorporates bug fixes and additional polish. There is now a proper ending, and the Game Over screen displays hints.

-WASD/arrow keys to move.

-Mouse to aim.

-Left Mouse Button or Left Control to fire at enemies.

-Space to interact with objects.

-Escape or P to pause & view your investigation notes.

Jam theme: Power. Jam limitation: Five-color palette.

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-73-power

Design, Art, & Code: Alexander Kazazis.

Music by Tony Longworth (via Unity Asset Store). https://tonylongworth.com/
